Variation task of UFB Join wrapped lines
lines joined according to:
Current var is appendend to RTRIMmed TargetVar
prefixed with:
1: if full previous line used, no prefix
2: first word of current line would fit on previous line, CrLf
3: in all other cases: single space
processing depends on both the 'current' and 'next' vars
Clear target var
Previous var full length stick current var at end
First word of current line would have fitted in previous var add CrLf
In all other cases add a single space (assume wrap)
If full length is used next line should not be prefixed with anything
A CrLf (Enter) was given if the first word of the next line would fit
in the currently read var
